definition: to act shamelessly/to behave in a way that leaves others tut-tutting and shaking their heads in disapproval
to play with/to wield/to act (cool etc)/to display (a skill, one's temper etc)
to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on

sentences.english: The mischievous boys blackguarded about the school.
sentences.chinese: 那些顽皮的男孩们在学校里耍无赖。

definition: to act shamelessly/to refuse to acknowledge that one has lost the game, or made a promise etc/to act dumb/to act as if sth never happened
to make a scene/to raise hell
to twist words and force logic (idiom)/sophistry/loud rhetoric making up for fallacious argument/shoving false arguments down people's throats
the guilty party files the suit/the thief cries thief
to lie through one's teeth (idiom)/to talk drivel
to play the fool (idiom)/to feign madness
to admit defeat/to give in/to acknowledge a mistake/to apologize/to be amenable to persuasion
